attributes.action: Decriminalisation of marijuana for medical use and recreational use.
attributes.additional_details: Because relaxing the rules will not only benefit the people but the country’s economy and commercial will be boosted majorly, it could be made safer so marijuana isnt as powerful and could be made into a more recessive strain, doing this will give people more freedom and give police enforcement more Resources and time.
attributes.background:
Decriminalisation of marijuana will boost our economy and make it safe for everyone, by legalising it, it can be regulated and made safer, 

Marijuana is no more dangerous then alcohol nor cigarettes, relaxing rules will give the police more resources to focus on more serious matters.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598861
